name: Don't Touch Anyone
description:
This is th first complete game I ever made. It's a simple top-down shooter, where you must survive as long as you can. Touching enemies will insta-kill you, so avoid that.

Use WASD to move, and left-click to shoot.

This was made for studying porpuses, all sprites were made by me in engine, and the sound effects were made in sfxr.

I know it's not GOTY material, but it was fun to work on. I leard a lot about game design basics and I hope to improve this skills in future projects.

Feel free to leave feedback.
